name: Procedurally Generated Mazes
description:
In this game, the mazes can generate randomly, for endless possibilities! Generate a random maze, or fine-tune the settings to your liking. There are many things that can appear in the maze, like enemies, or doors that need to be unlocked... But there's also treasure too, so collect as much as you can!

I created this project for my final year in University.  It was a look into procedural generation, so everything, from the maze to the items within, generates according to a set of rules.
